Posts.Content:
Hello, thanks for replying. 
I have spoken to my doctor and she said it won't be anything to do with my pcos as my hormone levels are all normal. 
I have my appointment for the hospital breast clinic on Monday. I just can't believe I didn't know the lump was even there. Since the doctor pointed it out to me it's really obvious.
Posts.Title: All very sudden

Posts.Content:
Hello, 
Well I had my appointment at hospital. 
I had an exam and doc could feel the lump so I had an ultrasound but it didn't show up on the ultrasound so they sent me home. 
It's good they didn't find anything nasty but what is it??
Posts.Title: All very sudden

Posts.Content:
That's right. I'm 29. 
They didn't say anything really, just took a slide sample of the leaking and said I could go home. 
I think I'm going to call the breast clinic today to see if someone can explain it to me.
Posts.Title: All very sudden

Posts.Content:
Hi guys,
I'm very new here and not even sure if this is where I belong. I just wanted a bit of advise and info I guess. 
I went to see my doc last week as my left nipple has been leaking for a while now. I just put it down to hormones as I have PCOS. 
The doc examined me and said that the tissue in my left felt different to the right and that she could also feel a hard area in the left too. I haddnt even thought to examine myself. So she decided to refer me to the hospital and do a blood test to check my hormones. 
I got a call yesterday to say my hormones are all normal and I have an appointment a week on monday.
I did post this already but I want to ask if anyone else has experienced nipple discharge and found a lump and what the outcome was. I don't have any pain or itchiness or anything. 
Thanks
Posts.Title: Discharge and hard area.

Posts.Content:
Hello, so I have my appointment on Monday at the breast clinic. 
I'm very nervous. I was kind of hoping that someone on her may have had similar symptoms and be able to give me their experience.

Posts.Title: All very sudden

Posts.Content:
Well they could feel a lump but it didn't show on ultrasound so they sent the discharge sample for cytology, I think it is. So get the result in a few days hopefully. 
I'm getting discomfort under my arm on that side too but I guess that might just be because im a bit tense.
